_aChangeLog.text: Fixed the reflection of the police van
Changed the method of breaking glass in the Windows of the airport halls (now do not crack but break)

_sText:
HIJACK

Hostage Rescue Map for Counter-Strike: Source

CS:GO original map creator: Spence!
CS:S map port creator: Niko
Navigation Mesh editor: Meurglis3

High quality port for CS:S of awesome atmospheric same-named map for CS:GO by Spence! / RabidMonkey. Hijack was inspired by unforgettable official map cs_747 from classic CS, but features a new layout and original custom content.

Story: 
   Terrorists have taken control of a chartered jet carrying foreign dignitaries in this hostage rescue scenario. Several hostages have been released, but negotiations to release the remaining have stalled. A SWAT element has been mobilized and given permission to retrieve the remaining hostages.

P.S. ~  No faggot handcuffs, the headshot only! :-)
